message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers significant value, even at that price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. That's the maximum I'm willing to pay.
I understand your position, Bob, but $80 is too low for me.  I could consider letting it go for $130.  This is a very fair offer considering its quality and value.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. That's the maximum I'm willing to pay.
